title.rendered: I don’t think drama-free Grand Slam can happen for me: Djokovic

content.rendered:
Serbian tennis star Novak Djokovic remarked, “Drama-free Grand Slam, I don’t think it can happen for me,” following backlash for his comments regarding Kosovo. After winning the French Open’s first round, Djokovic wrote a message regarding Kosovo on the camera lens.

Read Also: Mamata takes out rally seeking ‘justice’ for wrestlers in Kolkata

A dispute had started earlier at the Australian Open when Djokovic’s father was spotted among spectators waving Russian flags.
